title: ChatGPT-Integrated Instructional Design Strategies: Q Methodology for Mathematics Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical knowledge and understanding of fundamental instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: Acquiring practical strategies for integrating ChatGPT into instructional design for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze diverse perspectives on ChatGPT-integrated instructional design by applying Q methodology.
Learners can design a math education content development process (e.g., problem generation, explanation optimization) using ChatGPT.
Learners can identify and resolve key challenges (e.g., managing generated content quality, tool limitations) when using ChatGPT.

resources: Q-methodology survey templates for practical application

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
